Prerequisite(s): One Elemental Flux maneuver
Range: 30 ft.
Target: One or more creatures (see text)
Duration: Instantaneous

Description

You fill the air with elemental energy, which explodes as you strike your target. When you make an attack (including a strike), you can initiate this boost to fire a ray of energy at a creature within 30 feet. This ray requires a ranged touch attack to hit and deals [[3d6]] points of damage of your active element's associated energy type. Animus augmentation: You may spend two points of animus to create an additional ray. The rays may be fired at the same or different targets, but both rays must be aimed at targets within 30 feet of you.
